item.description:
. Last Year we saw a play at Edgerton Park and had a great time. The play starts at 8:00 PM but we should get there early to make sure that we reserve a good spot. Lets bring appetizer, and your favorite bottle wine to share.

Location: Edgerton Park
75 Cliff St.
New Haven, CT 06520
Date(s): August 19-22, 24-29, 31-Sept. 5, 2010
Time(s): 8 p.m.
Category: Performing Art
Description: The Elm Shakespeare Company presents William Shakespeare's "The Winter Tale.

Admission: Free with suggested donations: adults $20, students $10, children (12 and under) $5..

Phone: (203) 393-1436
URL: http://www.elmshakesp....


http://www.elmshakesp....

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: William Shakespeare's "Winter Tale"
